title: Matt Ryan is a system quarterback, Green Bay can survive without Aaron Rodgers, 'Hot Take or Just Right' Week 7 (Football 10/18)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Will Brinson discuss Raiders-Chiefs set for Thursday night and if new acquisition Navorro Bowman can make an impact for Oakland, and reflect on Marcus Mariota's performance on Monday Night Football. The guys are then joined by Jason La Canfora for this week's edition of 'Hot Take or Just Right'. Pete and Jason assign 'hot take' or 'just right' to Nick and Will's topics including; Matt Ryan is a system quarterback, Green Bay can stay afloat without Aaron Rodgers, Deshaun Watson will lead the NFL in touchdown passes at the end of the season, the Colts will win the AFC South, and more!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
